title: Assistant Digital Media Programming Editor - Pro Sports
text: Make Your Passion Your Career. â„¢ Work In Sports. Region Map Here is the job that interests you: Assistant Digital Media Programming Editor Pro Sports Posted/Updated: 10-20-2015 Brief Job Description: Select, prioritize, edit and post content of all types (text, video, photo, audio, etc.), always with the thought about what works best for the homepages (desktop, mobile, mobile apps)...   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
